name: 20 Shocking Celebrity Rants
description: We all lose our cool once in awhile but when a celebrity has a really bad day it is game ON!  In this one hour special, we’ll take a look at 20 shocking acts of celebrity misbehavior.  From Charlie Sheen’s outrageous rants to Christian Bale’s mind blowing meltdown, celebrities like Alec Mapa, Joel Stein, Debra Wilson and more count down the craziest celebrity freak-outs.
